effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a anorith.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into an Anorith.

flavor_text_entries.text:
大昔　海に　すんでいた
古代ポケモンの　カセキ。
ツメの　一部らしい。

A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that once lived in the sea. It appears
to be a fragment of a claw.

Fossile di un Pokémon preistorico che viveva in
mare. Sembra essere parte di un artiglio.

Fósil de un Pokémon ancestral que vivió en el
fondo del mar. Parece ser parte de una garra.

Das Fossil eines uralten Pokémon, das in der
Tiefsee lebte. Es sieht wie eine Klaue aus.

Le fossile d’un ancien Pokémon aquatique.
On dirait un morceau de griffe.

오랜 옛날 바다에 살았던
고대 포켓몬의 화석.
발톱의 일부인 듯하다.

おおむかし　うみに　すんでいた
こだい　ポケモンの　カセキ。
ツメの　いちぶ　らしい。

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a claw.
